post.text:
Join me LIVE in Denver, CO!

Be a voter. Learn more >> http://www.Vote.GOP
Help us win. Contribute >> http://www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Brett
comment.text: He is hitting 5-6 cities a day!! He is working sooooo hard. This is a clear sign of how passionate he is about becoming president! He will work hard for us!

replies.author: Reed
replies.text: To you and to us too! Greetings from Brazil.

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: This is why every single American needs to cast their vote for Trump. I have never seen any candidate work so hard for us. He has everything, he does this because he loves our country and wants us to be the best. I want the best for all of us, don't you?
